byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting from Rome.

abstract: Vatican sets date for trial of Jozef Wesolowski, former envoy and archbishop to Dominican Republic, on child sexual abuse and child pornography charges; trial will be first of its kind under new criminal procedure rules enacted by Pope Francis in response to global outcry over handling of sexual abuse cases.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican said that in July it would open a trial of its former envoy, Jozef Wesolowski, to the Dominican Republic on charges of sexually abusing boys and of possessing child pornography.

headline.main: Vatican Sets Trial for Ex-Ambassador Accused of Sexual Abuse
headline.print_headline: Vatican Sets Trial in July for Ex-Envoy to Caribbean
